description:
Fuuka Shirato is the Welding Wild Dance Enlightened. One of Yajirou`s former comrades, she was the only one who called him "Tiger." During the rebels` march on Tento while crossing the treacherous Mt. Charanbo, Yajirou was unable to save her after she fell off a cliff and she was presumed dead. However, the Jester saved her from her fall and caused an Enlightened Evil gun to assimilate with her, thus making her and the weapon one and the same.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Shirato Fuuka
